frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-remove-alttab-delay-v2
frozen.shortDescription: Another extension that removes the 0.15 second popup delay in switcher pop-ups. This extension is actively maintained. It fixes at least this known issue: https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/mutter/issues/888.
frozen.longDescription: Another extension that removes the 0.15 second popup delay in switcher pop-ups. This extension is actively maintained. It fixes at least this known issue: https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/mutter/issues/888.
